page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Both Walesby and Kirton are close to the A1, within 10 minutes, consequently a proportion of the people living in the area use this fact to their advantage for work purposes. This also means that both villages have a number of large lorries running through them, this affects Kirton more than Walesby as the main road runs through the centre of the former whereas the B6387 runs to the west of Walesby. Both villages have just one bus service running through them, linking them both to Ollerton and the nearest town with a railway station, Retford.
